                  SD7_down, z1d_down, z1e_down, z2d_down, z2e_down, z3a_down, z3b_down) %>%  
  mutate(location = "3' end")

#normalize
```{r}
meta <- rbind(upstream, downstream) %>% 
  mutate(location = factor(location, levels = c("5' end", "3' end"))) %>% 
  full_join(sample_des_size, by = "sample_ID") %>% 
  mutate(pro_24 = total.overlap/ `24`) %>% 
  mutate(pro_sm = total.overlap/ `total read`) %>% 
  mutate(pro_si = total.overlap/ `general siRNA`)

meta 
```



#plot
```{r}
axis_line <- data.frame(
  `bin start` = c(-Inf),
  location = c("5' end")
)

axis_line
```

```{r}
meta %>% 
  filter(genotype == "WT") %>% 
  filter(sample_type == "egg"|
           sample_type == "sperm"|
           sample_type == "seedling shoot"|
           sample_type == "zygote") %>% 
  mutate(sample_type = case_when(
    str_detect(sample_type, "seedling") ~ "seedling",
    T ~ sample_type
  )) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = bin.start, y = pro_24 * 1000)) +
  facet_grid(.~location, scales = "free_x")+
  geom_vline(data = axis_line, aes(xintercept = bin.start), size = 1.5) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = -Inf, size = 1.5) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = NA) +
  stat_summary(geom = "ribbon",  fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", aes(fill = sample_type), alpha = 0.3) +
  stat_summary(geom = "line", fun.y = mean, aes(group = sample_type, color = sample_type), size = 1.25, alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(-3000,-2000,-1000, 0, 1000, 2000, 2900),
                     labels = NULL)+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("tomato1", "seagreen", "dodgerblue2", "violetred2"),
                    limits = c("egg", "seedling", "sperm", "zygote")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("tomato1", "seagreen", "dodgerblue2", "violetred2"),
                    limits = c("egg", "seedling", "sperm", "zygote")) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 200, 400, 600)) +
  guides(fill = F) + 
  labs(color = NULL,
       x = NULL, 
       y = "24-nt siRNA coverage") + 
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(legend.position = c(0.78, 0.8)) +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 18, face="bold")) +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(colour="black")) +
  theme(axis.text.y=element_text(colour="black"))

ggsave(filename = "24_meta_gamate.svg", height = 4, width = 4.7)
ggsave(filename = "24_meta_gamate.png", height = 4, width = 4.7)
```


Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
